item.title: CouchDB Source Code Reading part9
item.description: couch_db:update_doc/4 引き続きcouch_db:update_docs/4を。 couch_db.erl: 1 if (AllOrNothing) and (PreCommitFailures /= []) -> 2 {aborted, 3 lists:foldl(fun({#doc{id=Id,revs=Revs}, Ref},Acc) -> 4 case lists:keyfind(Ref,1,PreCommitFailures) of 5 {Ref, Error} -> 6 case Revs of 7 {Pos, [RevId|_]} -> 8 [{{Id,{Pos, RevId}}, Error} | Acc]; 9 {0, []} ->
